title: Honduran Foreign Minister: U.S. Should Address Root Causes Of Migration
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks with Honduran Foreign Minister Mireya Aguero de Corrales, who's in Washington to help find a solution to the thousands of Central American children arriving at the U.S. border.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
